cleared_desc: All caches cleared. Redirecting to dashboard...
error_clearing: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
info: Clear cache if role changes don't reflect immediately
page_description: Clear application caches to fix UI issues, refresh permissions, or free up storage.
info_1: Role or permission changes not reflecting
info_4: Service worker conflicts or navigation errors
stats_description: Current cache usage and storage information
quick_clear_desc: Clear permissions, profile, and query cache. Safe for regular use.
full_clear_desc: Nuclear option: clear ALL storage, including saved settings and preferences.
selective_clear_desc: Clear specific cache categories individually for targeted fixes.
clearing_full_desc: Clearing ALL storage, service workers, and databases...
permissions_cleared_desc: Permission cache invalidated. Refresh to see changes.
